WHAT_SCHEDULE: What do we do with the schedule?
ERROR_DELETE_SCHEDULE: An error occurred when deleting the schedule
CONFIRM_DELETE_SCHEDULE: Sure you want to eliminate this schedule?
SCHEDULE_OVERLAP: The end of the schedule can not be equal to or less than the start of the schedule
SCHEDULE_END_OVERLAP: The end of the schedule can not be equal to or less than the start of the schedule
DELETE_FREE_DAYS: Every day marked as day off or holidays of this month will be eliminated. Do you agree?
SCHEDULE_CONFIRM: Schedule created, Start: {{ start }} End: {{ end }}, do you want to save it like that?
SELECT_EDIT_SCHEDULE: Select a new time zone to edit it
END_SCHEDULE: Set the end of your schedule
DAYTYPE_DONT_WORKED: This day is a holiday or free, you can`t set schedules

HELPERS.description1: We are going to make a bief visit for the options of the aplcation <b> swipe left or press next </ b>
HELPERS.description2: Click on a day in witch you want to establish a work shedule
HELPERS.description3: Select the start of your schedule and then the end of it
HELPERS.description4: You can select the type of day whether day off, worked or holidays. This will help you see what days you do not work

SELECT_HOURS_WORKDAY: Selecciona las horas que componen tu jornada laboral diaria.
SELECT_HOURS_WORKDAY_DESC: Esto servira para comprobar las horas extras que haces.
